name: node-ovsx-sign
description: A package for signing and verifying VS Code extensions

scripts.build: tsc -p ./tsconfig.json && yarn run lint && cp src/node-ovsx-sign lib/node-ovsx-sign
scripts.prepare: yarn run clean && yarn run build
scripts.publish:next: yarn publish --new-version "$(semver $npm_package_version -i minor)-next.$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)" --tag next --no-git-tag-version
